subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Coyotes franchise is banking on a combination of Wayne Gretzky magic, a roster with 10 players who are 23 or younger, and a few veterans mixed in to help.
snippet: The Coyotes franchise is banking on a combination of Wayne Gretzky magic, a roster with 10 players who are 23 or younger, and a few veterans mixed in to help.
